title: Secrets We Keep
description: It wasn't supposed to be this way.I wasn't supposed to be sitting here,waiting for this plastic stick to decide my fate.It was only supposed to be one night.I only wanted to numb the pain long enough to forget.I never thought I'd see him again.Turns out fate really had it in for me.Because the man I thought might be my salvation,is the most forbidden of them all.Completely off limits.Illegal in every way.Turns out, he's my History teacher.I'm completely, and utterly screwed.This story is a work of fiction. Some scenes and scenarios may contain trigger warnings for certain readers. This is a Taboo love story, please read with caution.
author: B.K. Leigh
